reviewText: I had a used copy of this that I obtained at a library book sale.  I thought it would be a good idea to have a spare copy as it has some very good safety info that I think everyone should know.  I wish there were more categories available.

Mr. Strong is quite dramatic, but he is informative.  There are scenarios demonstrated with different outcomes, showing a person what he might be likely to do and what he should do.  The victims portrayed are primarily women even though the crimes could happen to men also, such as carjacking, assault in a parking lot, what to do if one's vehicle breaks down.  There is some information about dealing with guns in the house to keep people safe.  There is good information given in the video, but for a more thorough education on the subject, see whether you can get a copy of his book, Strong on Defense.
